output:
CoursewareStopLoss Composition - Task Complete

Created: src/compositions/CoursewareStopLoss.tsx
Registered: src/Root.tsx (id='CoursewareStopLoss', 2100 frames, 30fps, 1080x1920)

Features:
- 70-second courseware-style animated infographic about stop-loss hunting
- Audio: staticFile('audio/stop-loss-narration.mp3')
- Dark background (#0d1117) with clean minimal design
- 6 animated sections with smooth fade transitions:
  1. INTRO (0-90): Title + subtitle with expanding cyan line decorations
  2. THE TRAP (90-540): Animated text, SVG price chart (strokeDashoffset), gold key phrase
  3. STOP HUNTING EXPLAINED (540-900): 4-step slide-in sequence with colored icons
  4. HOW TO PROTECT (900-1500): 3 spring-animated tip cards with green borders
  5. KEY TAKEAWAY (1500-1860): Animated clock SVG, gold emphasis text
  6. OUTRO (1860-2100): Branding with WolfAI logo
- 6 sticker reactions (surprised, sad, thinking, neutral, listening) with spring bounce-in/fade-out
- SVG animated price chart with stroke drawing animation
- 17-segment subtitle bar synced to narration
- Color palette: white, gold (#fbbf24), green (#00d27a), red (#ef4444), cyan (#00d4ff)
- TypeScript compiles clean (no new errors)
